title: Expecting empty properties to be returned as null values when creating a LAP TIME
gherkin:
When the user creates a "LAP TIME" "AVUS record" with the following data
  | key | value | datatype |
  | time | PT1M33.294S | string |
  | driver_name | Klaus Ludwig | string |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key | value | datatype |
  | time | PT1M33.294S | string |
  | driver_name | Klaus Ludwig | string |
  | date |  | string |
